sentences.sContent: But, some products, like some soft drinks, make it to every village in the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: But, some products, like some soft drinks, make it to every village in the world.
sentences.sCn: 但是，一些新产品，像一些软饮料却能够达及世界的每一个村庄。

sentences.sContent: Airplanes follow an invisible map of highways and avenues in the sky in order to make it to their destinations.
sentences.sContent_eng: Airplanes follow an invisible map of highways and avenues in the sky in order to make it to their destinations.
sentences.sCn: 为了到达目的地，飞机在空中也按照地图飞行，这种地图上面布满了看不见的公路和街道。

synos.tran: 赶上，找到；到达；及时赶到；（时间上）赶得及
